launchpad-alsa-0.1.0.0: Simple interface for the Novation Launchpad through ALSA

Safe HaskellNone
LanguageHaskell2010

System.MIDI.LaunchpadALSA.Extra

Contents

  • Extras & Examples

Description

Samples and other extras for LaunchpadALSA

You will want to import qualified or otherwise only what you want since main is defined, amongst other things.

Synopsis

  • resetAndLightOnKey :: App
  • keepLighting :: App
  • lightPressed :: App
  • main :: IO ()
  • allGrid :: [Word8]
  • allSide :: [Word8]
  • allColors :: [Color]
  • nicePattern :: [Data]
  • drawNicePattern :: App
  • reset :: App
  • green :: Color
  • red :: Color
  • off :: Color

Extras & Examples

resetAndLightOnKey :: App #

Sample App that turns on all the lights in a pretty pattern on the first event, resets all the lights on the second event (key up most likely), and then quits.

keepLighting :: App #

Sample App that keeps lighting the LEDs on keypresses.

lightPressed :: App #

Sample App that lights up the key that is pressed (except top buttons since they're unaddressable). Pressing the mixer button exits.

main :: IO () #

Sample main with above App.

allGrid :: [Word8] #

Keys for all the grid buttons.

allSide :: [Word8] #

Keys for all the side buttons.

allColors :: [Color] #

List of all the possible color values (16).

nicePattern :: [Data] #

A nice circular pattern.

drawNicePattern :: App #

App that draws colors from the centre of the grid.

reset :: App #

App that resets all the LEDs.

green :: Color #

Basic color green.

red :: Color #

Basic color red.

off :: Color #

Color value for off.
